Urine sample collect prior isotope administration , serially approximately 12 hour isotope administration Day 1 , daily Days 2-7 . These sample analyze mass spectrometry . On Day 1 , patient also undergo echocardiogram confirm size defect measure degree pulmonary/systemic blood flow ratio pulmonary artery pressure .
